Hey guys! Somewhat-New KSP user here. (New as in the most advanced thing I have ever done in KSP is putting something into orbit around Kerbin) I saw this community and thought it would be a nice opportunity to interact with the KSP community!

So I was looking around the forums a little bit, and I saw that some people that sent lots of Kerbals on a mission in one rocket. How do you do this?

Cheers, Mike

Hello, there!

What do you do? Add more capsules. Then go to the Crew Tab. (Next to the Parts and Action Groups on the top toolbar)

Now you can drag and drop crew members into slots that represent seats. Then, without going to another tab, save and launch.

(This is assuming you've got extra Kerbonauts to send... I.E. they are not dead )
